name: Shapitch
description:
An awesome game developed by SandS Arts.

You have to switch between shapes and shoot the enemies.You have to switch to the same shape as that of the enemies to shoot and kill them.

-Discover over 40 different characters !!! 

-There are over 80 different levels which include 6 BOSS FIGHTS.

-6 different backgrounds.

-Endless modes.

Available in PC and android.

Download now !!!
